channel.title: Spectre Pixel Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Spectre Pixel Theme

item.title: [linux] redis 설치
item.description: Amazon Linux 2 환경에서 redis 설치 # yum udpate sudo yum -y update # C 컴파일러 설치 sudo yum -y install gcc make # redis 설치 wget http://download.redis.io/redis-stable.tar.gz tar xvzf redis-stable.tar.gz cd redis-stable make # redis 설정 파일 복사 sudo mkdir /etc/redis sudo mkdir /var/lib/redis cd redis-stable sudo cp src/redis-server src/redis-cli /usr/local/bin cp redis.conf /etc/redis # redis 스크립트 다운로드 wget https://raw.github.com/saxenap/install-redis-amazon-linux-centos/master/redis-server cd /usr/local/bin sudo mv redis-server /etc/init.d sudo chmod 755 /etc/init.

item.title: hugo + github
item.description: hugo 설치 brew install hugo # Github repository 2개 생성 (blog, {username}.github.io) # 프로젝트 생성 hugo new site blog git init # themes(https://themes.gohugo.io/) # theme 경로 themes/theme 이름 git submodule add https://github.com/st-wong/hugo-spectre-pixel-theme.git themes/spectre-pixel # config 복사 cp blog/themes/spectre-pixel/exampleSite/config.toml blog/config.toml # config.toml 수정 # baseurl = "https://<username>.github.io/" # 서버 실행 (localhost:1313) hugo server # Github blog repository 연결 git remote add origin https://{token}@github.com/wogns2645/blog.git # Github {username}.github.io repository 연결 git submodule add -b master https://github.
